attributes.action: allow family and love ones to be able to phone their soilders working abroad free of charge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when my loved one went to falklands for 6 months he was allowed a half hour phone card a week to contact home . I also could phone him and a great cost . if we help the heros the most help would be contact from home. when these heros go away for months at a time leave children and familys behind they need as much contact from home as possible not all familys can affored to call them .
